amendment.description: To strike all after the enacting clause and insert complete new text entitled "Health Equity and Access for Returning Troops and Servicemembers Act of 2018".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, Sam amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Johnson, Sam.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Johnson, Sam.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson, Sam amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Johnson, Sam amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
